channel.title: Can Responder take down infrastructure?
channel.description:
So I'm in a situation where Responder could be useful but I somehow remember hearing that i could take down the network with the LLMNR poisoning.
Would running Responder WPAD to certain targeted machines pose a real risk of taking down the infra?
thanks! Isamurai

item.title: Can Responder take down infrastructure?
item.dc:creator: Taniesha
item.description:
Llmnr will only help you capture credentials

Read full topic

item.title: Can Responder take down infrastructure?

item.description:
Also depends in infra security since it may be disabled also in the domain setting but where you’ve peed inside the network you can do further
